modName: Add New Shout Inferno Storm via book
summary: This Skyrim Mod will teach the Player the \"Inferno Storm\" shout used by Alduin in the game.
descriptionHtml:
To learn the shout, go to High Hrothgar and look on the table at the end of the room where the Greybeards sleep. There is a book named \"Alduin\'s Voice\" lying on the table. Read the book to learn the shout.

You will need 3 Dragon Souls to unlock the full power of the shout after learning it and the Words from the book.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NEW in V3.0:  Sound added to the new Shout. Minor bugfixes.

NEW in V4.0:  Damage enhanced (Major bugfix).

NEW in V5.0:  Damage fix. Minor aesthetic changes.

NEW in V6.0:  Changes to the \"Alduin\'s Voice\" book text. Dragon font used for Shout Words of Power. Now 100% accurate with established in-game Dragon language.

NEW in V7.0:  Shout will no longer have any effects within interior cells.

NEW in V8.0:  Changes to the book text. Dragon Font enlarged and slightly colorized vs. rest of text.
author: The Mad Monk
